TopicTitle: Fast ang agile reusable rover for mk2 cargo bay (perfect for SSTO)

Articles.Content:
Let me introduce you new generation of compact rovers for SSTOs, previous my design (only for inner use ) was slow, fragile and very boring. But this piece engineering art - Jupiter-22 do not have any of this problem. It is light (only 0.62t), agile, fast (cruise speed ~20 m/s, maximum theoretical speed ~60 m/s) and compact (only 3/4 space in long mk2 cargo bay), can drive in completely dark environment (2 RTG on board).

Driving on Mun, Dres and Dune

On the top of Mun arch

Craft file + 2 sub-assemblies (one is rover with connection point and second is already packed rover in the cargo bay): http://www./download/2x42zewcr4p1ecr/Rover+Jupiter+22.zip

1. Always use SAS in time of driving

2. I recommend to assign separate keys for rover controls and use on light bodies only SAS rotation controls
